Interface DownloadHandler

public interface DownloadHandler

          Creates a package for sending over the network.

Method Detail

onCreateDownloadJob

public DownloadJob onCreateDownloadJob(int idJob)
Creates a package for sending over the network.
Parameters:
idJob - the id of the download job
Returns:
DownloadJob - the request object filled with the necessary data

onFinishDownload

public boolean onFinishDownload(DownloadJob job,
                                boolean lastDownload)
Returns the server response to the created package.
Parameters:
job - - the completed job
lastDownload - true - the request is completed, removed from the jobs queue and will not be sent
Returns:
true - the request has been accepted, false - the request should be repeated

onStartDownload

public void onStartDownload(int jobId)
The method should be called before sending a package over the network.
Parameters:
jobId - - the id of the download job
